bytebase.v1.CreateGroupRequest.jsonschem.description: Request message for creating a group.

groupEmail.description:
The email to use for the group, which will become the final component
 of the group's resource name.

bytebase.v1.CreateGroupRequest.jsonschem.title: Create Group Request

bytebase.v1.Group.jsonschema.strict.json.description: A group of users within the workspace.

email.description: The unique email for the group.

name.description:
The name of the group to retrieve.
 Format: groups/{group}, the group should be email or uuid.

source.description: The source system where the group originated (e.g., Entra ID for SCIM sync).

title.description: The display title of the group.

bytebase.v1.Group.jsonschema.strict.json.title: Group

bytebase.v1.GroupMember.jsonschema.stric.description: A member of a group with a role.

member.title: Member is the principal who belong to this group.

role.description: The member's role in the group.
role.title: Role

bytebase.v1.GroupMember.jsonschema.stric.title: Group Member
